 2015-08082015-06-11,  ,  ,  CIC,  PS,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectMinisterial Responsibilities Under the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act Order
PrecisMINISTERIAL RESPONSIBILITIES UNDER THE IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION ACT ORDER (IRPA) in order to (1) repeal Order in Council P.C. 2005-2042 of November 21, 2005; and (2) replace it with a new Order to ensure that the respective responsibilities of the Minister of Citizenship and Immigration and the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness are clearly delineated regarding specific provisions of the IRPA.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2015-0052 Publication Date: 2015-07-01
AttachmentsAttachment
